name: HandsomeHero
description:
Mobile: far left and far right of the beautiful carpet will allow you to roll yourself left and right. The middle of the carpet lets you jump. Tapping the screen will shoot a hot dog in that direction. Defeat 100 ravioli spewing bowl cuts to achieve a congratulatory sunset and "winner" text.

Computer: left arrow and right arrow will allow you to roll yourself left and right.  Up arrow lets you jump. Clicking left mouse button will shoot a hot dog in that direction. Defeat 100 ravioli spewing bowl cuts to achieve a congratulatory sunset and "winner" text.
